product_overview: A web-based IT notice management system designed to streamline notice registration, approval, and dispatch processes with integrated Outlook calendar synchronization using MS Graph API. It supports multi-channel notifications and enhances user accessibility without separate login.
core_goals: Automate IT notice registration and approval workflow via a web platform
Seamless integration with Outlook using MS Graph API for calendar event synchronization
Expand notification channels beyond email, including company messenger, portal, and mobile app
Provide a dashboard for monitoring notice statuses, statistics, and history
Enhance user convenience by offering SSO-based access and responsive UI across devices
Support state management of notices including completion status and linked notice flows
key_features: Dashboard displaying notices with status badges, dates, writers, and statistical charts
Notice writing form with inputs for title, content, type, importance, recipients, and scheduled dispatch time
Approval workflow where managers can approve or reject pending notices
Automated Outlook calendar event registration linked to approved notices
Multi-channel alerting system supporting email, company messenger (GW), portal, and KZ mobile app with standard API integration
Completion notice registration feature that visually updates schedule states in Outlook
Notice history and approval log tracking with search and filter capabilities
Responsive design optimized for desktop and mobile webviews
Notice type, affected service, sender department, recipient filters, and hashtag tagging for statistical tracking
user_flow_summary: User accesses Dashboard to view list of notices with statuses
Admin writes a new notice using the Notice Write form, specifying details and either immediate or scheduled dispatch
Notice enters PENDING status awaiting manager approval
Manager reviews notice details and approves or rejects via Notice Detail & Approval page
Upon approval, system registers event in Outlook 'IT Notice Schedule' resource calendar and dispatches emails and other channel notifications
User or admin can track dispatch history and status via History and Dashboard
For system maintenance or incident, completion notice can be registered to update status visually in calendar and notify recipients accordingly
validation_criteria: Notices can be created with valid required fields and submitted for approval
Only notices with PENDING status show approval options to authorized managers
Approved notices successfully create events in the dedicated Outlook calendar resource
Dispatch emails and multi-channel notifications are sent based on selected channels
Dashboard correctly reflects counts of notices by approval and dispatch status
History logs capture all approval and dispatch events accurately and can be filtered
Completion notices update the calendar event's visual state and send appropriate notifications
Responsive UI renders properly on mobile and desktop webviews without layout breaks
User access via SSO does not require separate login and permissions are enforced for notice approval

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Main page displaying a list of notices in a grid layout. Shows title, status badge, date, and writer. Fetches data from backend on load.

features.name: Write Notice
features.description: Form to create a new notice. Inputs for title, content, type, importance, recipients. Submits data to backend via POST /register.

features.name: Notice Detail & Approval
features.description: Displays detailed information of a specific notice. If status is PENDING, shows Approve/Reject buttons which call the backend API.

features.name: API Service
features.description: Axios instance configuration and helper functions (getNotices, registerNotice, approveNotice) to interact with the backend.
